body: Like its said before, Mc is a total idiot and i quote from remos18 a "dickhead". this story could haven been about exploring and learning more of the world before going on a rampage building and destroying his own dictatorship.

This story so good have everything you need in a great story.
If mc was not become that ruler then this would never have happened to him.

The moment I red head in mad rage mode she she reminds me of Erza, even tho
after losing her lover she wanted to kill him but when she saw people bruning
up with the fire she started and how mc save her made that redhead fall for him 
at the end she done everything she can too save mc life she a great elf I love her too
wow nhentai is uploading very slowly they have up to chapter 35 out already
@Alzriel that's the webtoon format, all of them are done this way.
Asshole finally got a taste of his own medicine.
I read  and all I can think is what a dick
lol wtf ? this dickhead mc guy suddenly playing as the victim guy real quick

Wow this went from happy and some how took a slope of darkness that started at killing 2 people and steadily dropped which is amazing. Even though its 600+ pages i read them all and the story and art was amazing, however i feel that there was to much white and that the story would work better if the pages filled the screen and did not require a shit ton of scrolling.
